name: UpdateErrorTrackingRelease
description:
Update details for an error tracking release.

Use this tool to modify the details of an error tracking release within a specified project environment on Datadog.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: error_tracking_release_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the error tracking release to be updated.

parameters.name: release_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the error tracking release to update.

parameters.name: release_hash_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string identifier for the error tracking release to be updated.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team associated with the error tracking release. Expected to be an integer.

parameters.name: release_creation_date
parameters.description: The date and time when the error tracking release was created. Expected in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2023-10-31T14:30:00Z).

parameters.name: release_metadata
parameters.description: Metadata for the error tracking release. This should be a string detailing any additional information relevant to the release.

parameters.name: release_version
parameters.description: The specific version of the error tracking release to update. It should be a string representing the version number.

parameters.name: release_project_name
parameters.description: The name of the project associated with the error tracking release to be updated.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking release.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking release.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
